#Project Roadmap

= Introduction =

Here, we will list the project targets for KillaKoptuz3000. Please try to write the targets as simple and clearly, as possible.

= Version Numbering Style =

In my opinion, the first playable version should be called Version 1. Minor improvements and bugfixes should be denoted by (Fabs)
